# Read Quality Control tools

## Quick glimpse
- Assuming that the most QC tools are installed, it is time to use them to do the following:
  - Check the quality of the reads.
  - Create summary report of quality metrics.
  - Trim poor read at a user-specified cutoff.
  - Remove contaminants.
